Uses of Package
org.ingatan.component.text

Packages that use org.ingatan.component.text
org.ingatan.component.answerfield Default answer fields, and the answer field inteface IAnswerField. 
org.ingatan.component.image Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane. 
org.ingatan.component.librarymanager Subcomponents of the library manager, as well as the LibraryManagerWindow itself. 
org.ingatan.component.quiztime The quiz window and settings dialog, as well as the TableQuestionUnit which is central to how TableQuestions are broken up and arranged in a sensible order. 
org.ingatan.component.text Text field and text area classes that have been tweaked to incoroporate the symbol menu. 
org.ingatan.event Event classes; I realised after the first few that ActionEvents and ActionListeners were a much better way of doing this. 
 

Classes in org.ingatan.component.text used by org.ingatan.component.answerfield
RichTextArea
          An extension of the JTextPane, the rich text area includes an instance of RichTextToolbar, which allows for easy formatting.

Classes in org.ingatan.component.text used by org.ingatan.component.text
DataTable.CustomTableCellEditor
          Selects all text when the cell editor is initiated so that the user may easily type over what has already been entered.

          Interface for embedded graphics returned by the ImageAcquisitionDialog.

RichTextToolbar
          Provides the GUI for a rich text editor toolbar.
SymbolMenu
          Provides a symbol menu which may be used as an inline menu for JTextComponents.
